data.name: Category_Common_Properties
data.value: Common

data.name: Description_CallMethodAction
data.value: Calls a method on a specified object when invoked.

data.name: Description_CallMethodAction_MethodName
data.value: Get or sets the name of the method to invoke.

data.name: Description_CallMethodAction_TargetObject
data.value: Gets or sets the object that exposes the method.

data.name: Description_ChangePropertyAction
data.value: An action that will change a specified property to a specified value when invoked.

data.name: Description_ChangePropertyAction_PropertyName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the property to change.

data.name: Description_ChangePropertyAction_TargetObject
data.value: Gets or sets the object whose property will be changed.

data.name: Description_ChangePropertyAction_Value
data.value: Gets or sets the value to set.

data.name: Description_ControlStoryboardAction
data.value: An action that will change the state of the specified Storyboard when executed.

data.name: Description_ControlStoryboardAction_ControlStoryboardOption
data.value: Gets or sets the action to execute on the Storyboard.

data.name: Description_ControlStoryboardAction_Storyboard
data.value: Gets or sets the targeted Storyboard.

data.name: Description_DataTriggerBehavior
data.value: A behavior that performs actions when the bound data meets a specified condition.

data.name: Description_DataTriggerBehavior_Actions
data.value: Gets or sets the collection of actions associated with the behavior.

data.name: Description_DataTriggerBehavior_Binding
data.value: Gets or sets the bound object that the DataTriggerBehavior will listen to.

data.name: Description_DataTriggerBehavior_ComparisonCondition
data.value: Gets or sets the type of comparison to be performed between Binding and Value.

data.name: Description_DataTriggerBehavior_Value
data.value: Gets or sets the value to be compared with the value of Binding.

data.name: Description_EventTriggerBehavior
data.value: A behavior that listens for a specified event on its source and executes its actions when that event is fired.

data.name: Description_EventTriggerBehavior_Actions
data.value: Gets or sets the collection of actions associated with the behavior.

data.name: Description_EventTriggerBehavior_EventName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the event to listen for.

data.name: Description_EventTriggerBehavior_SourceObject
data.value: Gets or sets the source object from which this behavior listens for events. If SourceObject is not set, the source will default to AssociatedObject.

data.name: Description_GoToStateAction
data.value: An action that will transition a FrameworkElement to a specified VisualState when executed.

data.name: Description_GoToStateAction_StateName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the VisualState.

data.name: Description_GoToStateAction_TargetObject
data.value: Gets or sets the target object.

data.name: Description_GoToStateAction_UseTransitions
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not to use a VisualTransition to transition between states.

data.name: Description_IncrementalUpdateBehavior
data.value: A behavior that allows incremental updating of ListView and GridView contents to support faster updating. By attaching this behavior to elements in the ItemTemplate used by these views, some of the updates can be deferred until there is render time available, resulting in a smoother experience.

data.name: Description_IncrementalUpdateBehavior_Phase
data.value: Gets or sets the relative priority of this incremental update. Lower Phase values are addressed first.

data.name: Description_InvokeCommandAction
data.value: Executes a specified ICommand when invoked.

data.name: Description_InvokeCommandAction_Command
data.value: Gets or sets the command the action should invoke.

data.name: Description_InvokeCommandAction_CommandParameter
data.value: Gets or sets the parameter that is passed to ICommand.Execute. If this is not set, the parameter from the InvokeCommandAction.Execute method will be used.

data.name: Description_InvokeCommandAction_InputConverter
data.value: Gets or sets the converter that is run on the parameter of the InvokeCommandAction.Execute method.

data.name: Description_InvokeCommandAction_InputConverterLanguage
data.value: Gets or sets the language that is passed to the IValueConverter.Convert method of InputConverter.

data.name: Description_InvokeCommandAction_InputConverterParameter
data.value: Gets or sets the parameter that is passed to the IValueConverter.Convert method of InputConverter.

data.name: Description_NavigateToPageAction
data.value: An action that switches the current visual to the specified Page.

data.name: Description_NavigateToPageAction_Parameter
data.value: Gets or sets the parameter that will be passed to the Frame.Navigate method.

data.name: Description_NavigateToPageAction_TargetPage
data.value: Gets or sets the fully qualified name of the Page to navigate to.

data.name: Description_PlaySoundAction
data.value: An action that will play a sound to completion.

data.name: Description_PlaySoundAction_Source
data.value: Gets or sets the location of the sound file.

data.name: Description_PlaySoundAction_Volume
data.value: Gets or set the volume of the sound.
